projects: [{"title":"Fact Checker App (Hackathon By Assam Police)","start_date":"Sep 2020","end_date":"Present","description":"Designing an app to check the validity of a fact there by enabling users to stay aware of fake news and rumors ."},{"title":"Indian Engineering Graduates Employ-ability Rate (Data Science Hackathon)","description":"Got to work on a data set of Engineering graduates where in data processing and cleaning was done using numpy and pandas , thereafter by making use of regression , support vector machines and ensemble created a model to predict outcomes on test set with higher accuracy."},{"title":"Inter Process Communication (Self Project) ","description":"Used C libraries sys/socket.h and netinet/in.h etc. to create servers which can work with multiple users and take in there requests and to avoid clashes of requests while writing to data bases locking mechanism was implemented (exlock and semaphores)."},{"title":"Kull The Conqueror (Self Project)","description":"A 2d adventure game using Quintus framework . Used tiled map editor to create awesome graphics and integrated it using javascript and quintus game framework ."},{"title":"Pac-Man Game (Self Project)","description":"Cloned the classic Pacman game using HTML 5 and vanilla JavaScript. Used canvas element to draw graphics, on the fly, via JavaScript ."}]
